PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE 
 
Payconiq is a free App that enables you:
- to pay in stores, your bills, in other Apps, in online shops across the Benelux,
- to send, receive and request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s). 
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- Transfers and payments from € 0.01 up to € 2,500 
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send and request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers 

* A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The BGL BNP Paribas Payconiq App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your biometrics or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: EUR 2,500). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day). 
 
* QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy. 
 
* SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
Payconiq is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated Payconiq, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is send out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated Payconiq, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account. 
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment. 
 
* IN STORE PAYMENT WITH PAYCONIQ QR CODES
 
Truly contactless payments with Payconiq QR codes: launch the Payconiq App, scan the Payconiq QR code and the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your biometrics/PIN Code and you’re done.

* BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the Payconiq QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided Payconiq payments are accepted. 
 
Feel free to use it at Payconiq partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. You may even add a tip and then just leave right away. 
 
* PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use Payconiq on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the Payconiq button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your Payconiq App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE
 
PAYCONIQ is a free App that enables you to pay in stores or online, to pay your bills and to send, receive & request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s) in Luxembourg.
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- From 0.01 € up to 10,000 €
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send & request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers
 
*** A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The PAYCONIQ App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your Fingerprint or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: 2500 EUR). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day).
 
*** QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy.
 
*** SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
PAYCONIQ is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated PAYCONIQ, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is sent out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated PAYCONIQ, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account.
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment.
 
*** IN STORE PAYMENT 
 
Truly contactless payments: launch the PAYCONIQ App, ,scan the  PAYCONIQ QR code, the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your fingerprint/PIN Code and you’re done.
 
*** BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the PAYCONIQ QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided PAYCONIQ payments are accepted.
 
Feel free to use it at PAYCONIQ partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. 
 
*** PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use PAYCONIQ on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the PAYCONIQ button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your PAYCONIQ App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

Information about cookies
The Capitol app uses Firebase Cloud Messaging to send messages to its users. It is essential to secure transactions with Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) using in-app notifications. To do so, it sends a previously generated anonymous Firebase Installation ID (FID) to Google so that we can identify app users and send them messages related to SCA purposes. The installation ID is stored on your device’s keychain secure place as strictly necessary to provide the services, and is removed when the app is uninstalled. Age of data consent

Cookie Informationen 
Die Advanzia App nutzt Firebase Cloud Messaging, um Nachrichten an ihre Benutzer zu senden. Es ist notwendig, Transaktionen mit Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) über in-App-Benachrichtigungen zu sichern. Hierfür wird eine zuvor generierte anonyme Firebase-Installations-ID (FID) an Google gesendet, damit wir App-Nutzer identifizieren und ihnen Nachrichten zu SCA-Zwecken senden können. Die Installations-ID wird im Schlüsselbund Ihres Geräts an einem sicheren Ort gespeichert, der für die Bereitstellung der Dienste unbedingt erforderlich ist, und wird entfernt, wenn die App deinstalliert wird. Zusätzlich zu den obligatorischen SCA-Benachrichtigungen wird die FID auch als unbedingt notwendig für optionale Benachrichtigungen verwendet, die Sie innerhalb der App anfordern können. Informationen über die Funktionalität von Cloud Messaging finden Sie unter https://firebase.google.com/products/cloud-messaging/

Con App Postepay alla tua giornata non serve altro! Puoi gestire la tua Carta prepagata Postepay e SIM PosteMobile per accedere a una vasta gamma di servizi di pagamento e di telefonia in mobilità. E se non hai ancora una carta Postepay puoi richiederla direttamente in App in pochi semplici passi.


PUOI RICHIEDERE LA CARTA POSTEPAY DIGITAL

Puoi richiedere subito la Carta Postepay Digital: la prima carta totalmente digitale di PostePay, richiedibile comodamente da App e che puoi utilizzare per i tuoi acquisti online e per tutti i servizi in App di cui hai bisogno


RICARICA LA TUA CARTA POSTEPAY DAL TUO CONTO BANCARIO E TIENILO SOTTO CONTROLLO DIRETTAMENTE IN APP POSTEPAY

Da oggi, grazie al Servizio Postepay Open, puoi ricaricare la tua carta Postepay utilizzando il conto che hai presso un’altra Banca e visualizzarne le informazioni (coordinate, saldo e lista movimenti) direttamente in App Postepay!

Scarica l’App ed inizia ad utilizzare il servizio cliccando su “Gestisci Postepay Open” o “Ricarica da altri conti”.


PAGA I TUOI ACQUISTI OVUNQUE TU SIA

• Inizia a vivere senza contante inquadrando con il tuo smarphone il Codice QR presente alle casse dei negozi convenzionati e autorizza il pagamento direttamente in App


RICARICA IN MODO SEMPLICE LA CARTE PREPAGATE E LE SIM

• Puoi ricaricare la tua carta prepagata Postepay utilizzando anche le carte di pagamento di altre banche. Puoi anche impostare una ricarica automatica della tua carta Postepay per non restare mai senza denaro, scegliendo la frequenza o la soglia di importo disponibili.
• Se hai una SIM PosteMobile o di un altro operatore puoi ricaricarla direttamente in App


GESTISCI LA TUA CARTA POSTEPAY E LA TUA SIM POSTEMOBILE IN MOBILITÀ

• Personalizza la tua carta Postepay, modifica i massimali di prelievo e pagamento, scegli l’area geografica di utilizzo, gestisci le funzionalità come il contactless o gli acquisti web. Puoi anche accedere a report e statistiche mensili sulle tue entrate e uscite e tenere sotto controllo le tue spese grazie alle notifiche in App
• Controlla e ricarica il credito residuo della tua SIM PosteMobile, visualizza i bonus residui del tuo Piano Tariffario, verifica i dettagli del traffico e attiva Offerte e Promozioni a te dedicate


SCAMBIA DENARO CON I TUOI CONTATTI E INVIA DENARO ALL’ESTERO

• Grazie al p2p eviti lo stress di raccogliere i soldi per pagare il conto o per un regalo, inoltre puoi pagare la tua parte senza il bisogno di ricordare il numero della carta del tuo amico
• Puoi scambiare anche i giga disponibili con il g2g, grazie alla SIM PosteMobile e all’offerta Postepay Connect
• Se possiedi una Carta Postepay Evolution puoi trasferire denaro, anche all'estero grazie all'integrazione di Western Union


C’È ANCORA MOLTO ALTRO CHE PUOI FARE

• Autorizzare con PosteID, impronta digitale o faceID gli acquisti e-commerce e le operazioni effettuate sui i siti poste
• Bloccare temporaneamente la carta ai pagamenti e ai prelievi
• Gestire i tuoi risparmi con un salvadanaio digitale per realizzare i tuoi desideri
• Puoi pagare il bollo auto e i bollettini, anche verso le PA, con la tua carta Postepay direttamente in App, anche inquadrando il codice tramite la fotocamera del tuo smartphone
• Trovare i negozi più vicini a te aderenti a ScontiPoste, guadagnare sconti in cashback sulle tue carte Postepay e visualizzare gli sconti accumulati


Per accedere ai servizi informativi e dispositivi devi essere registrato al sito poste.it. Se ancora non lo sei, puoi farlo direttamente in App. La registrazione tramite App è consentita solo ai cittadini maggiorenni con codice fiscale italiano e con domicilio in Italia. Per gli altri clienti la registrazione deve essere effettuata su poste.it.


Per saperne di più visita www.postepay.it e seguici sul nostro profilo Facebook (facebook.com/Postepay) per rimanere sempre aggiornato!

Consulta su https://www.poste.it/dichiarazione-accessibilita.html le dichiarazioni di accessibilità.
